Name: Hacked: Hentai prison

Now you see the whole world in binary code, but the only thing that connects you to the real world is hentai! After you once again cracked the Pentagon for you came, you hear the cops, they've already broken into your house! You try to escape, but you were caught and thrown into prison. To escape from there you will have to learn to control reality, this will help you to hentai! Hand out and go! Features: - A unique story; - Old-school design; - The atmosphere of the 90's; - Unique musical accompaniment on each level; - Labyrinths from the first person; - Hentai!
